text: The Last Stand is a 2013 American action crime movie. Arnold Schwarzenegger and Forest Whitaker star. The earlier plays Ray Owens, and the latter plays John Bannister. This action drama also has Johnny Knoxville acting in it. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * * * * Category:2013 action movies Category:2013 crime movies Category:American action movies Category:American crime movies Category:South Korean movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies set in Arizona Category:Lionsgate movies Category:Movies directed by Kim Jee-woon
title: The Last Stand
